message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.SC 

This paper proposes a solution for fast and safe on-chain payments on existing blockchains, which is a topic related to cryptography (cs.CR) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also introduces a novel approach for payment guarantees using collaterals, which involves data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of previous solutions and proposes a new approach that involves multiple statekeepers, which is related to consensus algorithms (cs.SC).
